message: This is the first product I'm offering, and I'm not sure if it's high-quality or low-quality. I'm selling it to you for $10000. If you buy it, you'll find out its quality afterwards. It's a one-time offer, and the price is non-negotiable. Would you like to take a chance?
I understand this is the first product and the price is non-negotiable. Given the uncertainty, I am willing to take the chance and pay $10000 for the product.

You've seen that I've sold one product so far, and you know that the product you bought was low-quality. I've sold one out of one product so far, and it was low-quality. Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the statistics and the risk involved, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

Thank you for the special deal, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the transparency. I'll take the high-quality product at the discounted price of $9000.

I want to be upfront with you - my track record isn't perfect, and I've had a few low-quality products slip through. But I'm confident that this next product is not one of them. Thank you for the detailed information and the guarantee. Given the statistics and your offer, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.
